text:
@RahulGandhi Domestic consumption.
Yes... that's is how you say and do things, the covid-19 situation should be controlled at the local level itself.

Am so proud, you have removed , the thoughts and feelings for our PM out of the window.
I cannot make see my 31 sets of teeth, i wanted you..
